name: Akka Venture
overview:
www.akkaventure.com - Akka Venture is a Paris and Stockholm based corporate finance firm focused on providing high level strategic and financial advisory to European growth companies and their investors.

We form a new generation corporate finance advisory firm with a native cross border positioning and an emphasis on quality from deal sourcing to its execution until it is completed. We have developed a strong image of quality in our specific field, with a high-end customer-centric positioning and tailor-made approach.

Our team combines highly experienced and motivated professionals. Our specific business requires multi-disciplinary competencies and a certain approach that we address with the highest standards in methodology and process thanks to a seasoned blend of investor, large corporation and entrepreneurial backgrounds, with rich international experience in Venture Capital, Strategy, Sales and Marketing and Finance.
